content: पृश्नि(ष्णि) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्पृअ-नि° किच्च पृषो° सलोपः; <ls>Uṇ. 4. 52</ls>] {@--1@} Short, small, dwarfish. {@--2@} Delicate, feeble. {@--3@} Diversified, spotted. {@--4@} Various, diverse (<ab>Ved.</ab>). --श्निः A dwarf. --श्नि {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A ray of light. {@--2@} The earth. {@--3@} The starry sky. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Devakī, mother of Kṛṣṇa. {@--5@} The earth. {@--6@} A cloud. {@--7@} Milk.
पृश्नि(ष्णि)का, पृश्नी(ष्णी) <ab>N.</ab> of an aquatic plant.
